chat_history.message: Hello, my iPhone 13 Pro has the following problem: It was estimated to be delivered last June 5th, but as of today I have not received any updates on the delivery status. Can you tell me where it is currently and how I can retrieve my package? Thank you for your help,

Hi ecomobile,

The customer has informed me that he has not received the parcel.

And I've just seen the link and I see that the parcel has been returned to sender and that you received it on 6/06.

Can you please provide some information?

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Patrizia Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We will be returning the phone back to the customer. Please provide us with an updated address in the following format:
NAME
ADDRESS
POSTAL CODE
TOWN/STREET NAME
COUNTRY
PHONE NUMBER
EMAIL ADDRESS

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
Regards,
KW

Hi ecomobile,

Here is the customer's address :
NAME : Rizzi Mariasole
ADDRESS : via capitello 19 Vigodarzere 35010 (PD)
POSTAL CODE : 35010 
TOWN/STREET NAME : Vigodarzere 
COUNTRY : Italia
PHONE NUMBER : 320 013 5946

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Patrizia Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have informed and made arrangements with our logistics partner in regards with the reshipment of the parcel accordingly. 

Thank you.

Regards, 
YL

Dear Backcare,

Here is the tracking number for the BIS order : 1ZBF1560D901236614

 Regards,
KW
